title: Ticket #5029: Documentation of ClassAds new vs. old syntax is incorrect/misleading
description: The documentation for Classads implies that there is a distinction between new and old classad syntax. This is no longer true. HTCondor instead uses the new classad library with a compatibility layer that adds on HTCondor specific behavior. There is no plan to ever move fully to 'new' classad syntax, we should strike that word entirely from our documentation.
remarks:
2015-Apr-29 08:38:03 by bbockelm:
To my knowledge, there's no difference between the old/new language. However, HTCondor loads many functions at runtime that are not present in the classads library.
check_ins: 2015-Apr-29 16:30   Check-in [44755]: ClassAd functions split(), splitUserName() and splitSlotName() return a 'List', not a 'String list' #4996 #5029 (By Karen Miller )
